definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: Five-year-olds seem to have an unquenchable thirst for knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 五岁孩子似乎都有如饥似渴的求知欲。

sentences.english: The basic function of management is to seek the way of knowledge-transfer.
sentences.chinese: 管理的最基本职能是寻求知识转化的路径与结点。

sentences.english: There is no end to what the children want to know; they always like to demand the how and why.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们的求知欲是无止境的，他们凡事总要寻根究底。

sentences.english: Is the knowledge seekers, enjoy the pleasure of reading a happy day.
sentences.chinese: 是求知者享受快乐阅读的幸福日。

sentences.english: The path to knowledge is now unbarred.
sentences.chinese: 如今求知之路畅通无阻。

sentences.english: What started out as a trip for knowledge called for courage.
sentences.chinese: 一开始作为寻求知识的旅行现在需要勇气了。

sentences.english: Yet for the minority, it is more important to seek pleasures than it is to seek knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 而对少数大学生而言，寻求快乐比寻求知识更重要。

sentences.english: I'm a very curious person naturally.
sentences.chinese: 我是个很有求知欲的人。

sentences.english: He is a curious boy who is always asking questions.
sentences.chinese: 他是个有求知欲的孩子，老是问这问那。

sentences.english: Thank you, Steve, for showing us what can happen when you stay hungry.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你，史蒂夫，当你求知若饥时已经展现了这一切。

sentences.english: Intellectual curiosity is about ideas and the need to think.
sentences.chinese: 求知的好奇心来自于新鲜想法和思考的需要。

sentences.english: We should creat a social environment in which teachers are respected, and education is valued, knowledge sought and learning stressed.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该创造一个尊师重教，求知好学的社会氛围。

sentences.english: Quote from Al-Quran, "To seek knowledge, go to China".
This library came to stand for his belief in learning and truth.
sentences.chinese: 这个藏书室代表了他对于求知和真理的信念。

sentences.english: Overcoming these stereotypes, then, has to begin with a sense of curiosity.
sentences.chinese: 要消除这些成见，首先要有一定的求知欲。

sentences.english: She is a woman of quiet strength and endlessly seeks knowledge and truth.
sentences.chinese: 她要有平静的力量和无休止地寻求知识和真理。

definition: to search for sth/to seek/to quest/to explore
to study the underlying principle to acquire knowledge (idiom); pursuing knowledge to the end
lit. diligent and never slacking (idiom); continuous concentrated effort/assiduous (in study)/to concentrate
to carry out (obligation) conscientiously/to behave sincerely
to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
sea of learning, no horizon (idiom); no limits to what one still has to learn/ars longa, vita brevis
no end to learning (idiom); There's always something new to study./You live and learn.
